item.title: Establishing proxy support for an application without proxy support
item.description: Introduction Link to heading Hello again dear reader :-)! Some time passed since my last blog post, because I have been busy with University, but now since exams are done, I have some more time for creating the latest post. Recently I stumbled upon an application that needed internet access but unfortunately didn’t support a proxy server yet. At that point of the project we had to find a way to allow this application to communicate directly with the internet, but without having a direct connection to the internet.
